basics.name: Kevin Colten
basics.label: CTO, Web Developer, Teacher
basics.summary: A life-learner and new technology nerd, I work hard at the things I love: programming, teaching, and learning.

work.summary: In charge of all things technical, authored curriculums, and taught web development courses to adult learners.
highlights: Responsible for entire company software infrastructure
Created, maintained, and led interns and contributers on Campus Manager, our custom Learning Managment System
Authored curriculums on HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB
Developed workbooks with CI integration for linting
Maintained web presences for all four locations Austin, San Antonio, Houston, and Dallas
Built reporting infrastructure that combined data from multiple sources: Payments, CRM, LMR, etc. Ask me about YoSQL!
Implemented automation for webhooks, status checks, user events, reports, deployments, tests, etc.

work.summary: Bokeh contributor, an open-source python driven graph generator. Implemented and designed client-specific projects and solutions.
highlights: Worked on https://anaconda.org, a packaging and environment manager repository
Contributed to open-source packages such as Bokeh (https://bokeh.pydata.org)
Fast-paced full-stack client-specific projects with mordern web development stacks

work.summary: Designed, built, and maintained in-house internet software. Headed small team of web developers and quality assurance technicians.
highlights: Flourished in a fast-paced, agile environment
Developed deep PHP and Javascript skills
Learned and implemented new technologies often
